subject: Basketball
Contests and Prizes
lead_paragraph: With an estimated 13,000 games covering 40 city blocks, the annual Hoopfest in downtown Spokane, Wash., is the world’s largest basketball tournament of its kind.
snippet: With an estimated 13,000 games covering 40 city blocks, the annual Hoopfest in downtown Spokane, Wash., is the world’s largest basketball tournament of its kind.
